channel.title: Help me with shops!
channel.description:
Please help me with shops i want to know how to change shop items prices but it's wierd in the shop cfg file where all the shop are and prices it says the items are 100 but in game its 5m plz help me!!!!! this is wat it looks like
shop = 48 Rares Shop! 1 1 1038 100 1040 100 1042 100 1044 100 1046 100 1048 100 1050 100 1053 100 1055 100 1057 100 6862 100 6860 100 6856 100 6858 100 6857 100 6859 100 6861 100 6863 100 2994 100 2992 100 2990 100 14519 100 14521 100 14520 100 3486 100 3481 100 3483 100 3485 100 3488 100 6623 100 6617 100 6625 100 6627 100 6633 100 14116 100 it would be set going side ways but not enough room
plz help

You change the prices in the item config.
